name: immios-app
description: Instant Marquees Melbourne Internal Operations Software

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/update-history.js patch
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/update-history.js minor
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/update-history.js major
